About-NiaApps

About

My name is Nia. I use they/them/theirs pronouns. I work at a Design Agency as a Developer. I'm east coast based and from New York City.

This website serves as the platform to showcase my work, and allow me to take on exciting new projects. I develop both native iOS & Android & cross platform apps in React Native, as well as design websites. I blog here. You can learn more about my past work here, or how projects are priced here. Thanks for stopping by!
